entries.headline: Fresh coat of paint
entries.blurb: The frontend got a massive glow-up! We've planted a unified header, a snazzy AI theme bar, and a polished Play page.

entries.headline: The hive has ears
entries.blurb: Added Whisper Large V3 to the API. Now we can turn your spoken buzzing into perfectly transcribed text.

entries.headline: Maestro mode activated
entries.blurb: Introduced the 'elevenmusic' model. You can now generate full instrumental tracks just by describing the vibe.

entries.headline: Voices found their soul
entries.blurb: Upgraded our text-to-speech engine to v3. The robots now speak 70+ languages and actually sound like they have feelings.

entries.headline: Welcome, Polly!
entries.blurb: Released Polly into the wildâ€”our new Discord bot that bridges the gap between community chatter and GitHub code.

entries.headline: Tuning the image engines
entries.blurb: Gave Flux, Sana, and Twinflow a tune-up. Expect higher stability and fewer hallucinations in your art.

entries.headline: Green means go
entries.blurb: The authorization page now matches our signature verdant green theme. Looking sharp while logging in.

entries.headline: Rectangles are free
entries.blurb: Fixed a bug where the Klein model was squishing everything into squares. Wide landscapes can breathe again.

entries.headline: Gemini price drop
entries.blurb: Aligned the Gemini registry metadata and significantly lowered the pollen cost. Smarter search for less nectar.

entries.headline: Preparing for summer
entries.blurb: Updated the Google Summer of Code page. We're getting the garden ready for a new batch of student contributors.

entries.headline: Audio inventory
entries.blurb: Added a dedicated endpoint to list all available audio models. The orchestra is organized.

entries.headline: Simplified accounting
entries.blurb: Streamlined the balance API to return a single, honest number. No more mental math needed.

entries.headline: Clicky buttons
entries.blurb: The 'Select all' button now shows a proper cursor hand. It's the little UI things that bring joy.

entries.headline: Audio gatekeepers
entries.blurb: Added audio models to the API key permissions UI. You can now control exactly who gets to make noise.
